reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: I used this dimmer switch to do the dimmer mod on my Breville Infuser espresso machine. It was an easy install and works great, no compatibility issues with my machine's electronics/programming. The switch has turned my Infuser into a flow control machine that rivals higher end machines costing thousands of dollars more. One of the best bang for the buck I ever made.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2025
reviews.title: Used to dimmer mod my espresso machine, turning it into a flow control monster!

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: Good bargain priced dimmer, I wanted the 1970's rotary look. Compact switch size, I have two switches in a 2-gang box with enough room for connections and a pass-thru branch. One switch controls LED an LED branch and one controls incandescents. The incandescent dim almost all they way, probably around 98%. Nice and smooth, no issues. The LED's do not dim nearly as dark, probably 90 to 95%. The LED brand I am using claims 95% dimmable so I don't know if a more expensive dimmer would go much darker. There is no flicker or buzz with either the LEDs or incandescents. Knob is twist on, NOT a push knob. Comes with three interchangeable knob colors, white, light almond and a slightly darker classic ivory.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2025
reviews.title: Performs well and fits tight box space.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: The people at Leviton produced an excellent product. Their rotary dimmer switch for our dimmable LED lights performs as we hoped. As said, it is has the rotary behavior, not the push in option, which what we preferred. Very smooth and it looks great. Also there's no need to buy a light plate. The rotary knob covers the hole in the plate beautifully. Also, very helpful. Supply are three different color knobs, which helps in most applications, except black. Again, an excellent choice. Question, please ask. Amazon will patch you through and one of us will step up to help.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2024
reviews.title: Excellent Choice: Quality Construction, Ease to install & Use

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: Liked that this came with wires attached to connect to our supply wires. The first item we ordered had side screws,(no wires) which made it harder to hook up. This one worked well. Pull yours out off wall to check if you need the wires. Is not a push off/on, just a dial.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2024
reviews.title: Worked to replace our old one.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: When I tried to replace my existing dimmer - I was stymied. The HomeDepot one was standard but the one in place was a Leviton. The wiring was different. Thought that I would need an electrician. Finally thought - just by another Leviton dimmer! Easy install. Only thing I had to get used to was that it wasn't a push on / push off. It's a rotate - from OFF to ON to brightness as chosen.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.title: Why didn't I think of this MUCH sooner?

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: This is actually a five-star product, works great on dimmable LED bulbs. I knocked off three stars because the package had been opened, ivory and almond knobs removed, then taped to close it again. I had to call Leviton and the ivory knob I wanted will arrive in 10-14 days. Shame on Amazon for shipping this opened package with parts missing. Shame on Amazon for making this the only way I can tell them it sucks to receive a previously opened package. Not Leviton’s fault.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.title: Missing ivory and almond knobs

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: Lots to like about this product. BE SURE to go to the Leviton web site and look up compatible bulbs. The list is surprisingly short. This switch did not work with Linkind dimmable bulbs - flickered. BTW, Linkind works great with other dimmers in the house, so no bad words for that company. Did not give 5 stars because it is picky about the brand of bulb.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.title: Be sure to choose bulb carefully

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: I moved into a house built in the 1930s and found that the 80 year old electrical system has smaller junction boxes than today's houses. This dimmer is a little smaller than most and fits in the junction box with enough room for the wires. It doesn't have the holes where you push the wires into the switch, you wire it together with the house wires with wire nuts. I would have preferred to have a traditional switch, but I can easily live with the rotary knob. It comes with 3 different colored knobs, white and two shades of off white.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2021
reviews.title: Works great with LED Panel

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: I had an old one after 35 years broke down,press down to turn on,this newer one all you need is turn keep rotate will increse or decrease the brightness,I brought two same model,they both have different colors wire for HOT (power source),all you need to turn off breaker,a cheap power tester only cost few dollars,electrian tape another few dollars ,single blade razor from Hardware store ,screw driver ,don,t drop the screws,make sure proper alignment when install the screw.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2021
reviews.title: Leviton Rotary dimmer

reviews.text: The labeling seems to indicate that the lights can be switched on / off at any position. This is not correct. The with must be rotated each and every time to the dimmest setting before being able to access on / off. Otherwise works well and installation is simple.

reviews.title: Does not switch On/Off at any position. Must be rotated to activate.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: bought this to control the brightness of 5000k daylight ceiling fan light. Fairly simple to install, just like replacing any other switch. one thing tho...I had a switch for light and one for the fan, after replacing, I need to keep both switches on for the dimmer switch to work. Not a problem, but something to keep in mind. Other wise works great, levels of brightness from very dim to very bright are easy to control. extra knobs are handy to color match!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.title: easy to install and works!

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: Description says Push on/off from vendor while product delivered is not push on ! Leviton RNL06-10Z Trimatron Universal Rotary Dimmer Trimatron lighting controls are traditional rotary-style dimmers available in single-pole (one location) and 3-way (multi-location) Push-On/Push-Off versions for LED, CFL and incandescent lighting and quiet fan speed control. With a compact, easy-to-install design, Trimatron dimmers provide an easy fit even in shallow wallboxes. The classic style of Trimatron dimmers is ideal for enhancing the decor of traditional homes while simultaneously upgrading functionality to support latest bulb technology. Action: Push for On/Off, Rotary control for lighting level control, Available Colors: White, Ivory, Light Almond, Color: White, 150W LED and CFL, Load Type: Incandescent, Halogen, Dimmable LED, Dimmable CFL, Locator Light: N/A, Phase Control: Forward phase control, Preset: Non-preset, Protection: Radio/TV Filter, Style Name: Trimatron, Switch Type: Single-Pole, Type: Electro-Mechanical, Voltage: 120 VAC.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
reviews.title: Not what vendor description says - is not push on/push off

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RNL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: Thai was relatively easy to install to replace an older dimmer switch. It fits in a standard electrical box & uses the standard switch cover plate. If you have dimmable LED lights, you need this. The older dimmers cause a flicker with LEDs, due to the lower current draw.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
reviews.title: Good for LED lights
